Title: A Dead Kid, a Notebook, and a Lot of Maybes
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Timothy J. Sexton, Cole Maliska (executive story editor), Ryan Maldonado (story editor), Eduardo Javier Canto (story editor), Mo Masi (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Intelligence tries to find a missing teenage boy they believe could be a threat to the students at his wealthy school when they find disturbing drawings in his notebook.
